address: Xã Cương Gián, Huyện Nghi Xuân, Tỉnh Hà Tĩnh
thought:
**My Analysis of the Administrative Address Mapping**

Okay, so I'm being asked to figure out the current administrative location of the old address "Xã Cương Gián, Huyện Nghi Xuân, Tỉnh Hà Tĩnh." This is a straightforward task, and I'm confident I can handle it.

First things first, I immediately recognized "Tỉnh Hà Tĩnh" as the province.  I quickly checked for any province-level boundary changes using resolution "60-NQ/TW," but Hà Tĩnh isn't slated for any mergers or divisions.  Good, that simplifies things.

Next, I zeroed in on "Xã Cương Gián." I dug into a set of other relevant resolutions, specifically looking for any mentions of this particular xã. That's when I found Resolution "1665/NQ-UBTVQH15."  Line 35 of this resolution was the key! It clearly stated that "Xã Cương Gián," along with Xuân Liên and Cổ Đạm, would be *merged* to form a new ward called "**Xã Cổ Đạm**." Eureka!

Now that I've identified the *target* new ward, I checked the most up-to-date ward data.  I was able to swiftly confirm the existence of "Xã Cổ Đạm" within Hà Tĩnh province. The data entry {"ward_code":"18394","ward_name":"Xã Cổ Đạm","province_name":"Tỉnh Hà Tĩnh"} validates my findings.

**Conclusion:**  Based on this meticulous and direct mapping, I can confidently state that the old "Xã Cương Gián" is now part of the new "Xã Cổ Đạm" in Hà Tĩnh province. The certainty level for this conclusion is high; I found a direct match and confirmed it with the relevant data.

citation.header: 1665/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Hà Tĩnh
citation.line: 35. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Cương Gián, Xuân Liên và Cổ Đạm thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Cổ Đạm.
